value.title: Simplify access and identity provisioning with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about identity governance and how you can safeguard access to your organizationâ€™s data.

value.title: Secure your application by using OpenID Connect and Azure AD
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to enable users to authenticate in multiple systems by using their Azure AD identities.

value.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning to train a model and register it in a workspace.

value.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

value.title: Manage access to an Azure subscription by using Azure role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: Learn how to assign management access to a subscription by using Azure role-based access control.

value.title: Secure Azure Active Directory users with Multi-Factor Authentication
value.excerpt: Learn how to use multi-factor authentication with Azure AD to harden your user accounts.

value.title: AI edge engineer
value.excerpt: The AI edge engineer learning path takes an engineering-led approach for the deployment of AI to edge devices within the framework of the cloud. This learning path helps the participants to learn skills in AI (broadly covering machine learning and deep learning algorithms), IoT and DevOps.

topItems.title: Deploy a prebuilt module to the Edge device

value.title: Implement a Data Streaming Solution with Azure Streaming Analytics
value.excerpt: Learn the concepts of event processing and streaming data and how this applies to Azure Stream Analytics. You will then set up a stream analytics job to stream data, and learn how to manage and monitor a running job.

topItems.title: Work with data streams by using Azure Stream Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Explore how Azure Stream Analytics integrates with your applications or Internet of Things devices to gain insights with real-time streaming data.

topItems.title: Transform data by using Azure Stream Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure Stream Analytics jobs to process input data, transform it with a query, and return results

value.title: Enable automatic updates in a web application using Azure Functions and SignalR Service
value.excerpt: Update a web app's notification mechanism from polling to push-based architecture with SignalR Service, Azure Cosmos DB and Azure Functions.

value.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure
value.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

value.title: Work with data streams by using Azure Stream Analytics
value.excerpt: Explore how Azure Stream Analytics integrates with your applications or Internet of Things devices to gain insights with real-time streaming data.

value.title: Store and Access NoSQL Data with Azure Cosmos DB and the Table API
value.excerpt: By using the Azure Cosmos DB Table API, you will benefit from the low latency, high availability, and scalability of Azure Cosmos DB in a Table storage application.

value.title: Discover ways to foster an AI-ready culture in your business
value.excerpt: In this learning path, you will hear from top Microsoft executives about a framework to drive the key changes that are necessary to become an AI -ready organization. You will be able to identify the successful implementations of AI and articulate relevant scenarios. You will be able to discuss a line of business specific and relevant uses cases in finance, marketing, sales, and customer service. And finally, you will be able to identify  AI solutions to implement in your organization based upon its maturity.

topItems.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture
topItems.excerpt: Understand the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and a framework to drive the change needed in your organization for a successful AI strategy.

topItems.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in finance
topItems.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise finance organizations to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.

topItems.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in marketing
topItems.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise marketing organizations to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.

topItems.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in sales
topItems.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise sales organizations to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.

value.title: Make your application storage highly available with read-access geo-redundant storage
value.excerpt: In this module, you learn how to make your application storage highly available by ensuring that you can fail over resources if there's an Azure region failure.

value.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Hub
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Transform data by using Azure Stream Analytics
value.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure Stream Analytics jobs to process input data, transform it with a query, and return results

value.title: Create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: Learn how to create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC).

value.title: Introduce the foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product
value.excerpt: DevOps is the union of people, process, and products to enable continuous delivery of value to our end users. Discover the first two foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product.

value.title: Create Intelligent Bots with the Azure Bot Service
value.excerpt: Learn how to build a chat bot and add intelligence to the Bot by integrating QnA Maker and LUIS.

topItems.title: Build a bot with QnA Maker and Azure Bot Service
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create a bot that answers frequently asked questions.

value.title: Migrate application workloads and data to Azure
value.excerpt: Determine a migration approach for on-premises workloads and databases and ready those resources for migration to Microsoft Azure. Migrate on-premises Hyper-V-based application workloads and relational data to the cloud using Azure Migrate.

topItems.title: Design your migration to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Minimize the time and resources required to migrate your on-premises environment to Azure. Assess your current systems with Azure Migrate, and migrate them with Azure Migrate and Azure Database Migration Service.

topItems.title: Prepare on-premises workloads for migration to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Prepare on-premises workloads for migration to Azure

topItems.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

value.title: Build a bot with QnA Maker and Azure Bot Service
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a bot that answers frequently asked questions.

value.title: Build a web app with Blazor WebAssembly and Visual Studio Code
value.excerpt: Learn how to set up your development environment and build your first WebAssembly app with Blazor, Visual Studio Code, and C#.

value.title: Design an IP addressing schema for your Azure deployment
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to plan and implement an IP addressing scheme for virtual networks and virtual machines in Azure.

value.title: Centralize your core services by using hub and spoke Azure virtual network architecture
value.excerpt: Design a network architecture in Azure that allows for growth and flexibility, secure isolation of critical resources, low administrative overhead, and communication with on-premises network resources.

value.title: Strengthen authentication (conditional access) with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about modern authentication and the security benefits it provides to your organization, such as enabling multi-factor authentication and a passwordless environment.

value.title: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage
value.excerpt: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage

value.title: Publish and manage your APIs with Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Learn about using an Azure API gateway to share APIs with partners, and how to use subscription keys to control access to your APIs.

value.title: Store and share files in your application with Azure Files
value.excerpt: Azure Files provides a cloud-based file share for storing and sharing files to applications. Whether it's an application hosted in Azure App Service, an Azure VM, or an on-premises app, Azure Files can store and share file access between one or more applications and systems in a secure and failure-resilient manner.

value.title: Design a hybrid network architecture on Azure
value.excerpt: You have a traditional on-premises infrastructure that you need to connect to resources in Azure. In this module, you learn how to select a connectivity method for your use cases that balances functionality, cost, and security.

value.title: Optimize the performance of Azure Cosmos DB by using partitioning and indexing strategies
value.excerpt: Learn how to measure the performance of your NoSQL Azure Cosmos DB database, by monitoring, partitioning, and indexing
